titles.title: A bill to modify and extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain cases or containers to be used for electronic drawing toys, electronic games, or educational toys.
A bill to modify and extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain cases or containers to be used for electronic drawing toys, electronic games, or educational toys.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for the duty-free treatment of cases or containers for educational toys or devices. Extends the suspension of duty on certain cases or containers for electronic drawing toys or electronic games.
